title: Portfolio Send
description: Receive information about my current portfolio, and receive regular pricing updates for each entry

spawn.description: If set to 1, will spawn 'proposal_open_contract' streams for all outstanding contracts in the portfolio. This is useful to create a portfolio page with dynamically updating contract prices.

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.
